summary: Diff updates Hero/About copy to ZIKOLN and increases pink/magenta accents across sections and global theme tokens; siteConfig name and footer copyright line are updated accordingly. One acceptance criterion (ensuring no placeholder name appears anywhere else) cannot be confirmed from the provided diff summary.

missing_requirements.requirement: No other user-facing sections show the placeholder name (e.g., “Alex Rivera”).
missing_requirements.reason: The diff shows `siteConfig.ts` and `FooterSection.tsx` updated to “ZIKOLN”, but the summary does not include evidence of searching/updating any other components/content that might still render the old placeholder name, so this AC cannot be verified from the provided changes alone.

hallucinated_features.description: Added/modified footer includes Caffeine.ai attribution link with UTM tracking and a heart icon.
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest only asked to update the copyright line/name and increase pink accents; it did not request adding or changing external attribution/marketing links.
